name: Bendy 2D: Low Budget Edition (CHAPTER TWO)
description:
⚠ WARNING: This Game  Contains Jumpscares And Loud Noises! ⚠

STORY:

WELCOME TO BENDY 2D: Low Budget Edition! Play As Henry, As He Makes His Way Deeper Into The Cartoon Studio And Stumbles Upon The Music Department!

Bendy & The Ink Machine Franchise Belongs To Kindly Beast And Its Team!

DISCLAMIER:

Credits to Joey Drew Studios for the original game NOT AN OFFICIAL BENDY AND THE INK MACHINE PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH JOEY DREW STUDIOS INC. THIS PROJECT IS NON-PROFIT AND IS MADE FOR NO OTHER REASON THEN FOR FUN! the use of Batim Assets Is To signify its a bendy fangame and nothing else. Check Out The Original Game! It's Awesome!

IN-GAME CONTROLS:

+ W,S,A,D To Move Henry Throughout The Chapter!

+ Click To Interact With Instruments,Audio Logs, And Buttons/Levers!

OUR CURRENT TEAM:

@SunnehBoi     -  Owner| Programmer | StoryBoard Director| Ideas Giver

@Addictiive  - Concept Artist | Secondary Artist

@kiriu_idk     - Lead Artist | Concept Artist 

@Catster - Made The Earliest Build Of This Game
